TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ArrangeDirection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the direction in which the system arranges minimized windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ArrangeDirection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeDirection Down = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Arranged vertically, from top to bottom. Valid with the and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight> enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeDirection Left = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Arranged horizontally, from left to right. Valid with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight> enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeDirection Right = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Arranged horizontally, from right to left. Valid with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft> enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeDirection Up = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Arranged vertically, from bottom to top. Valid with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight> enumeration values.
